aboutModal.title: Notepad.exe - About_Me.txt
aboutModal.about1: I'm a front-end wizard based in Brazil. I've always been passionate about technology and creating beautiful user experiences. I specialize in React, Vue, and Typescript and have experience working with Git Flow, unit testing, object-oriented programming, and agile methodologies to build seamless and intuitive web applications.
aboutModal.about2: When I'm not changing the world one pixel at a time, you can find me working on my latest indie game project or strumming away on my guitar. Currently, I'm working as a Senior Front-end Developer at CI&T, where I'm constantly pushing myself to learn and grow as a developer. I'm excited about what the future holds, and I can't wait to see where my career takes me next!

cavescape.title: CaveScape
cavescape.description: CaveScape is a 2-bit platformer "metroidvania" made for the Community Game Jam 2019! Following the theme "The game is a liar". This exploration platformer lies about the items and powerups you get.

awaken.title: Awaken the Dev-U
awaken.description: Mobile choose-your-adventure game made for "Integra Unifei 2020"

torrato.title: Torrato
torrato.description: Torrato is a game about a mouse trapped inside an oven, made in 48 hours for the Dev-U Jam Final Showdown!

spacial.title: Spacial Dog
spacial.description: Prototype Made for Ludum Dare 42. Run out of space, avoiding asteroids and a solar explosion while collecting fuel.

froggy.title: Froggy
froggy.description: Froggy is a customizable general purpose bot for moderators and anime fans.

surigu.title: Surigu UI
surigu.description: React Component Library built on top of styled-system.
